Are you on the hunt for your next job or internship? Did you know we have a careers page? ðŸ¤” Use the links below or scan the QR codes to take you there directly, simply scan the code with your phone camera and follow the link! If you're looking for a new career or wanting to take your own career to the next level then give us a follow ðŸ’œ

The future workforce is here. Are you ready for them? Partner with Junior Achievement of Northern California (JA) to prepare the next generation of employees. Our programs teach 16- to 25-year-olds about #financialliteracy, #workreadiness, and #entrepreneurship. In fact, 69% of JA alumni say they currently work in their dream career. When you partner with #JA, you're not just investing in the future of young people. You're also investing in the future of your business. When young people see that you're committed to their success, they're more likely to want to work for you. Contact me today to learn more about how we can work together to build a prosperous future.
